p: Among the faunal groups, human beings have been related to birds in various ways due to their presence in practically all ecosystems, their high abundance, and the ease of establishing contact with them [ 2]. In Mexico occur between 1123 and 1150 species [ 3, 4], which represent nearly 11% of the bird species richness existing in the world [ 5]. This country is currently the eleventh country with higher bird species richness and the fourth with higher endemism, with 194 to 212 species having some degree of endemism [ 5].
